data.text: @Sobhan85660532 [2/2] Our Colleagues are doing their best and will reply to your concern as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding. Kind regards, Funda

@Sobhan85660532 [1/2] Hi, I am truly sorry that you still haven't got any answer from our side. Due to the considerable amount of inquiries sent to us you may experience 
longer waiting times at the moment.
@michalbottka Hallo Michal, unsere Maskenpflicht an Bord besteht nur noch für Flüge von/nach Ägypten, China und Japan. Liebe Grüße, Mia

@tinsch98 Hi Tina,es freut uns,dass dir der Flug mit uns gefallen hat und wir mit dem Mittag-und Abendessen deinen Geschmack getroffen haben.Schade,dass dies beim Frühstück nicht der Fall war.Gerne leiten wir sowohl dein Lob als auch deine Kritik an die Fachabteilung weiter.Liebe Grüße,Mia
@CDP143S Hi @cdp143s, thank you for the kind words! Kind regards, Mia
@MBetinova Hi Miroslava, please be so kind and send us your case number in a DM. I´ll forward it to our colleagues with a note of urgency. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

With the new pre-order, we turn your flight into a culinary journey! If you are travelling on short-& medium-haul flights in economy class, you can pick your meal before departure. An important step towards greater sustainability and against food waste 👉🏼 https://t.co/nfM9hcxyl7

urls.title: Austrian Melangerie
urls.description: Willkommen bei der Austrian Melangerie: Genießen Sie ausgewählte österreichische Speisen und regionale Snacks auf unseren Kurz- und Mittelstreckenflügen.

data.text:
@MBetinova Hi Miroslava, our colleagues will reply to you as soon as possible. They are confronted with a high amount of requests at the moment and this makes it difficult for them to keep the usual average responding time. We appreciate your continued patience.
Best regards, Denis

@daboeita Hi, we are sorry you still haven't got an answer yet.Unfortunately,our colleagues are working through a considerable backlog which means response times are a lot longer than normal. We-theSocialMediaTeam cannot assist you further. We kindly ask for your understanding.

Our buffets in the lounges are free of single use plastic items and all meals are prepared on demand to reduce food waste. Also our wines come from local vineyards, produced by local farmers and the vast majority of our lounges' food is sourced nationally. ✈️ #MakeChangeFly 2/2

data.text: Following the motto "responsible and local", the offer for our guests in the lounges at @flughafen_wien  is getting more sustainable step by step. Together with Donhauser GmbH, we have reached the next milestone!🥘🌿  1/2 https://t.co/UjcqdSQb7X

data.text: @RogerBronchal Hi Roger, we truly apologize for the delay to your luggage and the inconvenience caused. Please send us your claim number in a PM and we will take a look. Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6AFJS
@AlmaKH9 Hi Alma, Marrakech is one of our winter destinations. 🙂 Best regards Sandra

Besides flights to the Mediterranean, long-haul flights will of course also have a lot to offer again next summer, such as non-stop flights from Vienna to Los Angeles. You can book all summer flight schedule destinations now at https://t.co/YLEBDoSwT7! 📲 3/3

domain.name: Cities
domain.description: Cities around the world

urls.title: Book now and discover the most beautiful destinations
urls.description: Even in these times, we bring you safely to your desired destination. Whether on the ground or in the air: we always pay attention to hygiene and your health.

data.text: We are expanding our summer flight schedule with Porto, Marseille, Billund, Palermo, Tromsö, Vilnius and Tivat which makes us the clear number 1 in Austria. ✈️ 2/3

Can't stop thinking about next summer during the frosty winter months?  Then we have something for you: with 120 destinations and 1200 flights per week, our Austrian summer flight schedule offers you enough opportunities to dance into the sunset! ☀️ 1/3

@mehisformargaux Hello,I am sorry to hear that. The Social Media Team does not have access to the baggage system. You can check the status of your baggage online via this link https://t.co/hrzpeJ2rHC Best regards, Alessandra

@GatoxXerran @sekerova Hi Gatox, we're truly sorry that you haven haven't responded on your message. We have checked your inquiry and see that our colleagues have already answered on your e-mail inquiry. Kind regards, Daphne

@KlinglerSar @Lufthansa_DE @lufthansa @FlySWISS @BrusselsAirNews @dfs_de [2/2]Für positiv getestete Cockpit- und Cabin-Mitarbeiter:innen sieht das interne Schutzkonzept derzeit vor, dass sie für max. 10 Tage unter Fortzahlung des Entgelts freigestellt werden.Ein Freitesten ist ab dem 5. Tag möglich(neg. PCR-Test bzw. CT-Wert ≥ 30). Liebe Grüße,Funda

data.text: @KlinglerSar @Lufthansa_DE @lufthansa @FlySWISS @BrusselsAirNews @dfs_de [1/2] Hallo, Austrian Airlines hat seit Ausbruch der Covid19-Pandemie stetig Maßnahmen gesetzt, um Fluggäste und Mitarbeiter:innen bestmöglich vor Ansteckungen zu schützen und hat sich dabei an der jeweils gültigen Verordnung der Bundesregierung orientiert bzw. diese umgesetzt.

data.text: @phanestef Hi there, we already sent a note of urgency to our colleagues. Still, we kindly ask you for your patience. Our colleagues will get back to you as soo as possible. Kind regards, Funda
@GatoxXerran @sekerova Hi there, please send us your file reference in a DM and we will have a closer look. Kind regards, Funda

@esweckert [2/2] Every case is handled individually to ensure that all applicable reimbursement options are offered. Please send us your reference number via PM, so we can take a closer look. Thank you for your understanding. Best regards, Shawn

@esweckert [1/2] Hi Thomas, we understand that we're testing our guests' patience at the moment. Our respective colleagues are doing their best to answer all requests as quickly as possible, although we receive a great number of submissions daily which leads to very long handling times.
@blolop_ Hi there, yes the copy should be submitted via a link. Kind regards, Derya
@stew_deano Hi, we are sorry you have not received a response yet. Please send us a PM with your claim reference number. Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

urls.title: Hilfe & Kontakt
urls.description: Sie haben Fragen rund um Ihre Reservierungen, Ihren Flug oder Ihr Gepäck? Kontaktieren Sie uns über unser Kontaktformular.Wir helfen Ihnen gerne weiter.

data.text: #ServusA320neo! ❤️👋🏼 Just before the weekend kick-off, an @_austrian team transferred our second #A320neo ✈️ from Toulouse to Vienna. Our newest and more fuel-efficient addition to the fleet will be named #Seewinkel and takes off on its first passenger flight in December 2022. https://t.co/X7AasZCnky
@BillyBog1 Hi Billy, KLXOS10011 is your missing luggage report - we we're asking for your case reference nr which starts 22XX-OS-XXXXX. Kind regards, Daphne

@Jayphen Hi, on intercontinental routings (including feeder flights) the first bag shall be accepted free of charge. If you have an economy light fare on a short-haul flight no luggage is included even with *G. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@marjoriexile Hello Ida!
Unfortunately, we cannot tell you a specific time of response, since your case has to be handled by various different departments. Still, we can assure you that our colleagues are doing their best to get back to you with news soon!
Best regards
Alessandra

@KCerkica Hi there, we are sorry to see that your luggage has been damaged during transportation. Please fill out our online form regarding this matter. You can use the following link https://t.co/0sMmStae9j. Our colleagues will assist you further. Best regards, Shawn

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @fortuna05oliver Hi Oliver, wir haben dir auf deine PN geantwortet. Liebe Grüße, Lyndsay

@ellzCreationz Hi there, the phone number is: +44 20 76608190
Best regards, Denis
@Sarahkratt @lufthansa Hi Sarah, we're sorry that you have not received a response yet. Please send us your claim reference number via PM so we can check the status for you. Kind regards, Lyndsay

data.text: @karim57788277 @karim we apologize that you have not received a response yet. Our colleagues are doing their best to work through a backlog of cases as quickly as possible. Please send us a PM with your case number so we can check the status for you. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@tuxford_jacob @swissportNews online form here to contact the responsible department: https://t.co/gkxxiAghiq Kind regards, Daphne [2/2]

urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @tuxford_jacob @swissportNews Hi Jacob, unfortunately, we, the Social Media Team, have no access to any baggage system or to any claims submitted by you. Please refer to the contact stated in your missing luggage report. Otherwise, you can fill out the [1/2]

@Edbed19 Hi there, if you have sent your request already, please be assured that our responsible colleagues will get back to you as soon as possible. Due to the current situation, the response can, unfortunately, take longer than usual. Thank you for your patience. Kind regards, Chris

@wandermom Hi Michelle, we are sorry to hear about your missing baggage. If your bag has been missing from a flight operated by Vueling we can only ask you to get in touch with the operating airline directly. Kind regards, Chris

data.text: @BillyBog1 Hi Billy, we apologize one more time for any inconvenience caused. If you have sent your request via our form already https://t.co/DlPk2wk146 you have received a reference number (XXXX-OS-XXXXX) Please send us this number in a DM for further investigation. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @thackerpharmacy Hi there, thank you for reaching out. We are sorry to hear that the baby stroller still couldn´t be found. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused. Please send us your claim number in a DM. We´ll gladly have a closer look into this matter. Kind regards
@GodAmericaTexas Hi, I just replied to your DM. Best regards, Sandra

@blolop_ Hi there, we are sorry for any frustration caused by the length of time taken to solve your issue. We just sent a note of urgency to the respective department. You should be contacted soon.
 Kind regards, Chris
@Edbed19 Hi there, to request a confirmation regarding your delayed baggage we kindly ask you to send the following online form https://t.co/BxP4utn6f4 Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Enquiry about confirmation
urls.description: Do you have questions about a booking confirmation, or do you need additional information? Please write to us, and our team at Austrian Airlines will be happy to provide information.

data.text: @LadyMiarae Hi Mia, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@AnnieAdam6 Dear Annie, I apologize for this E-Mail flood. It's a known bug in our system and our colleagues from IT are currently working on it. Kind regards, Petra
@kasababcia Hello Scott, kindly fill out our online form https://t.co/FFefe6Jqyt Kind regards, Mia

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @Byea Hi there, we're sincerely sorry about this. It has already been reported and your colleagues try to fix it as soon as possible. Best regards, Christiane
@kivavala1 Hi Audra, I've already replied to your DM. Best regards, Christiane
@kivavala1 Hi Audra, no, you've not been blocked. I've already replied to your postings. Best regards, Christiane
@kivavala1 Hi Audra, I've just replied to your DM. Best regards, Christiane

@Edbed19 Hi there, given the increased requests at the moment the processing time is above average. We appreciate your continued patience. Rest assured that your case will be handled and our colleagues will get back to you as soon as possible. Kind regards, Derya
@bkcarolina Hello again Kevin, I have already replied to your Facebook pm. Kind regards, Mia
@geensmith1 Hello Kevin, for this and for next season Newcastle is not planned. But our flight program keeps changing, so you never know, maybe one day we might travel to your city😉Kind regards, Mia

data.text: @kaatpleunis Hello Karen, we apologize for the inconvenience this caused you. Kindly send us your booking reference and full name in a pm, so we can take a look at it. Kind regards, Mia

@j_skrivanek Hi Johannes, vielen Dank für's Melden. Geht es in der Mail auch immer um die selbe Buchung? Wir haben das Problem bereits weitergeleitet und hoffen, dass dies bald behoben wird. Es tut uns leid für die Umstände! Liebe Grüße, Daphne

@AlexliuIs Hi Alex, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Have you sent our online form regarding compensation already? https://t.co/DlPk2wk146 If so, our colleagues will definitely get back to you. Unfortunately, the processing can currently take longer than usual, Kind regards, Chris

data.text: @CeciliaElving Hi, we apologize for any issues with our form. If it does not work in another browser please send your claim to impressum@austrian.com Kind regards, Lyndsay

@vagelis_h Hi, as you've already been informed, you provided your luggage claim references. To receive monetary compensation, you'll have to file the respective web form: https://t.co/DlPk2wk146 and you'll get an auto-reply with that reference number format: 2210-OS.xxxxx. BR, Christiane

data.text: @AnaisHutin Hi Anais, the form seems to be working. Can you please try opening it in a different browser? https://t.co/gkxxiAghiq Sorry for the inconvenience. Kind regards, Petra

urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @duzdanisaq Hi Ismail, we are sorry to hear of the disruption to your journey. Our colleagues will do their best to reunite your husband with his luggage as soon as possible. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@cocoglam Hi, I'm sorry your luggage is delayed. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to our baggage systems. Please refer to the contact on your PIR which you received at the airport Lost & Found. The contact there will be glad to assist you. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@nahamsec Hi Ben, we're sorry you've had difficulties rebooking. If your flight is soon its best to contact our call center again. Alternatively, send us a PM with your booking code and we'll take a look. However, we cannot assist if payment is involved. Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@LyneHey Hi, I've just replied to your PM. Please mind that your case has been sent back to Lufthansa for processing as Lufthansa is responsible for it in this case. Best regards, Christiane

data.text: @AbdallahgalalAg @Lufthansa_USA @staralliance @lufthansa [1/2] Hi Abdallah, we regret to hear that your baggage is still missing and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. data.text: @LyneHey Hi there, we're sorry that you haven't received an answer yet. Please send us your case nr (22XX-OS-XXXXX) via DM and we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Daphne
@Ayylllaaa Hi, the flights were temporarily suspended up to and including 28th October. You can check the status of future flights via the "My Booking" option on our website. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@bayistheway Hi there, the operation to Tehran by Austrian and Lufthansa Airlines will be temporarily suspended until October 28, 2022. Best regards, Christiane

data.text: @HOSSEEIIN Hi Hossein, I've just replied to your DM. Best regards, Christiane
@gabbin_gaby Hi Gaby, we're sorry that you haven't received any answer yet to your inquiry. Please send us your case nr. (22XX-OS-XXXXX) via PM and we can take a look. Kind regards, Daphne

@ClaireDoerr15 [2/2] Please be so kind as to let us know via PM if you have received any reference numbers, so we can check if your entry was correctly received and lined up. Thank you for your understanding and patience. Best regards, Shawn
@ClaireDoerr15 [1/2] Hi Claire, we are sorry that you have not received an answer yet. Of course, this is not the service we want to provide our guests and does not meet our standards.

@ziryansalayi [2/2] Please be so kind as to let us know via PM if you have received any reference numbers, so we can check if your entry was correctly received and lined up. Thank you for your understanding and patience. Best regards, Shawn
@ziryansalayi [1/2] Hi Ziryan, we are sorry that you have not received an answer yet. Of course, this is not the service we want to provide our guests and does not meet our standards.

3/3
CEO Annette Mann: “The Austrian team fought for this result in spite of strong headwinds. We are proud to be able to repay the state-backed loan in full early thanks to this team effort! We say thank you!"

Find the press release here: https://t.co/5DjTdF6b28

urls.title: Austrian Airlines says ‘thank you’: Strong third quarter and repayment of state-backed loan put Austrian Airlines back on course - Austrian Airlines
urls.description: After two and a half years of crisis, Austrian Airlines flew back into the black with a record summer. In spite of numerous systemic challenges in European

data.text:
2/3
Austrian Airlines closed the third quarter with a three-digit plus at 110 million euro. This summer, the 🇦🇹 flag carrier flew over 4 million guests with a regularity rate of 99.2% this summer. The early end of the salary waiver underlines the upswing at Austrian Airlines.

1/3 
Danke! ❤️ We say thank you! 🇦🇹✈️ #WeAreAustrian 
Three years earlier than planned, we will repay the state backed loan in full by the end of the year. We thank our passengers, the Austrian government, our partners and our #AustrianTeam! https://t.co/tvbjxdu28X

data.text: @donika00072313 Hello Donika, I'm sorry that you are already waiting for so long. Please send me your file reference number XXXX-OS-XXXXXX via pm so we can have a closer look at your complaint. Kind regards, Mia

@DennisGrzywatz (2/2) The contact person there will be glad to assist you.
Best regards, Alessandra

@DennisGrzywatz (1/2) Hello Dennis,
Please turn to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR – you’ve received the Passenger Irregularity Report at the Lost & Found counter at the airport, it is where all information about your case is collected.
@sty0pa Hi there, yes, definitely working on it. Sorry for the extra long waiting time. Best regards, Sandra

@AbdallahgalalAg @lufthansa (2/2) they are currently unable to adhere to their normal response time. Best regards,
Alessandra
